channel.title: Blogs on J Jones
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on J Jones

item.title: 8 Ways To Not Turn Your Support Tech Into A Drunk
item.description: No matter what they say, your problems are your support tech’s problem. How you behave during this time of crisis lends to the service you end up with and by using these eight pointers you can stop driving mommy and daddy to drink. Save your support tech and get everyone back to smiling again.

item.title: Customers Lie
item.description: You don’t want to admit it, but you know that it’s true. Sometimes, it is not even intentional and just happens. We also tend to call them “mistakes” to soften everyones’ feels. You do it, I do it, everyone does it. Let’s talk about it.

item.title: The Blessed Trifecta
item.description: Sometimes your mail ends up in their SPAM folder, and you wonder why. No one seems to know why a legitimate mail going from point A to point B could get… lost. But there’s a simple reason why. You’re here. Let me tell you why.

item.title: When The Chips Fall
item.description: There are tales we all can tell of times when things have went oh, so right, and then became a tragic tale of events that turned oh, so wrong. The levels of wrong are relative, but when you have to dust off and polish your resume on short notice, you know you’ve screwed up. This is that story.
